title: Having trouble finding font name
content:
I lost the name of a font I really like, I have a picture of about 15 letters of the font. If someone recognizes it and can tell me what it's called, I'd really appreciate it. Picture below:  
 [http://tinypic.com/r/epp3pz/5](http://web.archive.org/web/20131011025151/http:/tinypic.com/r/epp3pz/5 "http://tinypic.com/r/epp3pz/5")
author: fonttreadonme
